alert.note: Alert for Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:06PM EST until March 10 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch north of Lodi, Akron, Ravenna and Warren with little to no additional accumulation farther south. * WHERE...Medina, Summit, Portage and Trumbull counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A burst of snow will impact Medina, northern Summit, northern Portage and northern Trumbull Counties over the next couple of hours. Briefly heavy snow can lead to visibility fluctuations and briefly slick roadways. After this burst of snow exits any additional snow will be quite light, allowing for the advisory to expire later this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
